author: Zoe Jewell
title: Drake Gives Rihanna a Sweet Birthday Shoutout During a Concert
text:
Drake has only love and respect for Rihanna . 
The rapper split up with RiRi in October after going public with their relationship in the summer, but it seems the star hasn't quite left the beauty behind him. 
In fact, the Canadian native had only nice things to say about the “We Found Love” songstress during his show in Dublin, Ireland on Monday, February 20, which happened to be her birthday. A post shared by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Feb 20, 2017 at 4:06pm PST 
"It's somebody's birthday today — somebody I have a lot of love for and a lot of respect for,” he shared onstage. 
"So, instead of singing 'Happy Birthday,' we’re just going to do this in Dublin. Instead of singing 'Happy Birthday,' we're going to set it off, just like this,” he said before launching into her song “Work.” of note from tonight, drake did all his songs with rihanna and shouted her birthday out @TMZ see me fam pic.twitter.com/1o5bXwbFIa (@aymangolassi) February 21, 2017 
This isn’t the first time the “Hotline Bling” hitmaker has praised his former flame — during a show in London he dubbed the 29-year-old the “queen of everything.” 
"If you want your woman to feel sexy and s—t you play the Riri records,” he said. 
The “One Dance musician revealed his love for the brunette beauty at the MTV Video Music Awards back in August . 
"She's someone I've been in love with since I was 22 years old. She's one of my best friends in the world,” he said to the crowd. 
“All my adult life, I've looked up to her, even though she's younger than me. She's a living, breathing legend in our industry.”
